## Exploratory Data Analysis and Data Summary
This data set has `r sum(!complete.cases(ToothGrowth))` incomplete cases.  Moreover, each variable's summary statistics are
``` {r, echo=FALSE}
     library(plyr)
     library(ggplot2)
     library(car)
     library(lattice)
     data(mtcars)
     summary(mtcars)
```

``` {r, echo=FALSE}
     full.model <- lm(mpg ~ ., data=mtcars)
     model1 <- update(full.model, mpg ~ . -cyl)
     model2 <- update(model1, mpg ~ . -vs)
     model3 <- update(model2, mpg ~ . -carb)
     reduced.model <- step(full.model, direction="backward")
```
